text: Francis Alan Jackson, CBE (2 October 1917 - 10 January 2022) was a British organist and composer. He was the organist and director of music at York Minster for 36 years. He was appointed organist and director of music at York Minster in 1946 and held these positions until his retirement in 1982. Jackson died on 10 January 2022, aged 104.Organist and composer Francis Jackson dies, aged 104 ==References== ==Other websites== * Francis Jackson in conversation with Simon Lindley * Francis Jackson compositions at Banks Music Category:1917 births Category:2022 deaths Category:English centenarians Category:English composers Category:Musicians from Yorkshire
title: Francis Jackson
